overview:
Beycon made its first steps in a very hard period that it was second half of 90’s and internet and web technologies were beginning to develop newly in our country and the world, the opportunities that it served could not be understood exactly.

Our company being in a growth trend periodically, while it was serving dominantly on hardware, it enlarged its service range continuously and began to serve in web design, web software, search engine optimization SEO, corporate communication consulting.

According to the Beycon vision managed by 46 young people expert in web based software, it is progressing on the way to raise its brand awareness.
